Dear Customers,
Honeywell’s in-flight connectivity solution, JetWave™, provides you with opportunities you’ve never had before at 30,000 feet. With worldwide coverage and speeds up to 15 Mbps, you won’t miss an important moment ever again on your aircraft.
Whether it be a dance recital you promised yourself you wouldn’t miss, or a significant business meeting where your feedback is critical – you won’t miss it again with JetWave.
Plus, when you manage your connection speeds with Honeywell’s premier services platform, GoDirect™, you can confidently stream from your seat knowing you have the speeds you need to connect!
Schedule your upgrade with StandardAero and join the hundreds of aircraft flying with JetWave today.
